p.id, p.parent_permission_id, p.permission_name, p.authorization_url, p.description, p.is_available as available, p.create_time, p.update_time
mapper.select:
select
from user u left join user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join role r on ur.role_id = r.id left join role_permission rp on r.id = rp.role_id left join permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.id = #{userId}
